In a statement provided by Allen Iverson 's manager, Gary Moore , Andrews said Allen Iverson probably won't be able to return for six to eight weeks or more. "At this point it is certainly more important to get[ Allen Iverson 's] calf healed and asymptomatic than it is to try to play with continued pain," Andrews wrote. The injury

friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's "Meet The Press." Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said. "It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury," she added. The 40-year-old Gabrielle Giffords has survived despite being shot through the head

, taking over day-to-day operations as CEO as of April 4. The company said the goal of the surprise executive change, the biggest at the Web firm since Eric Schmidt joined it as CEO in 2001, is to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular new products, one of his key passions, as he said on a conference calls. starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. "We need to completely rethink the minivan," CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. At the Detroit auto show last week, Sergio Marchionne said offering both minivans in Chrysler dealerships is confusing to customers. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles, we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Mr Eric Schmidt said. Solomon Wilcots has talked with coaches for the Eagles about Kevin Kolb . They love him. They just love Mike Michael Vick more, he said. Solomon Wilcots agrees with the Eagles enthusiasm for Kevin Kolb and thinks he is a perfect quarterback to lead the Bengals into the future. "The president has stated unequivocally that he will veto any legislation containing earmarks, and the House will not pass any bills that contain them," Mr. Daniel Inouye said in a statement. Given the reality before us, it makes no sense to accept earmark requests that have no chance of being enacted into law.
